quote: The best way to predict the future is to create it. – Abraham Lincoln
fact: Mosquito repellents don`t repel. They hide you. The spray blocks the mosquito`s sensors so they don`t know you`re there.
tip: Use keyboard shortcuts to save time.
joke: I had a pair of racing snails. I removed their shells to make them more aerodynamic, but they became sluggish.
